name: leap should be false when year is not divisible by 4
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be false when year is not divisible by 4" do
    expected = false
    actual = leap 2015
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be false when year is divisible by 2 not divisible by 4
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be false when year is divisible by 2 not divisible by 4" do
    expected = false
    actual = leap 1970
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be true when year is divisible by 4
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be true when year is divisible by 4" do
    expected = true
    actual = leap 1964
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be true when year divisible by 4, not divisible by 100
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be true when year divisible by 4, not divisible by 100" do
    expected = true
    actual = leap 1996
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be true when year divisible by 4 and 5
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be true when year divisible by 4 and 5" do
    expected = true
    actual = leap 1960
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be false when year divisible by 100, not divisible by 400
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be false when year divisible by 100, not divisible by 400" do
    expected = false
    actual = leap 2100
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be true when year divisible by 400 and 100
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be true when year divisible by 400 and 100" do
    expected = true
    actual = leap 2000
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be false when year divisible by 4 and 100
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be false when year divisible by 4 and 100" do
    expected = false
    actual = leap 1900
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: leap should be false when year divisible by 200, not divisble by 400
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "leap should be false when year divisible by 200, not divisble by 400" do
    expected = false
    actual = leap 1800
    ensureEqual expected actual
